author: vamsic007
msg: GERONIMO-5950 "AMQ-3121: Avoid connection creation while creating XAResource if the connection factory is not an xa connection factory"
o Create a customized ActiveMQ 4.1.2 build for Geronimo 2.1.8. Jars changed are activemq-core and activemq-ra.
o Update server poms to use this build 4.1.2-G20110506.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1100163, add a write lock check to the revert handling.
(new_revert_internal): Expect a write lock on the directory containing
this node, which might be the directory itself for the wcroot.

msg: CAMEL-3949: Sending message to log endpoint should not convert payload to StreamCache. Added showStreams options to log endpoint.
